amendment.description: Amendment makes technical, clarifying or minor changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part B of House Report 109-175 to make technical revisions and minor, non-controversial changes and amendments to clarify certain provisions and correct oversights and errors found after H.R. 2601 was reported.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Hyde.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hyde amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
